result.content:
Hi every codeforces users ... Today I saw something that really made me sad ... I saw an application that let the ukrainian people recognize the russian products and the reason that this application is made is to make ukrainian people don't communicate with dear russian people and forget russia .. But today I want to say that all of ukrainian and russian people should be united and don't let the war make a wall between them , their minds , they fellings and so many other things that I can't mension here ...

NOTICE : i just wrote this entry to remind all peoples to be with each other be united and don't think that the communication ways between ukrainian and russian people can be this simply ruined :)

Wish luck for all of you dear friends ...
